TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase

summary.span: 表示會顯示字串值的 Windows 微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項)。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays string values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項顯示從選取的單一字串值按一下向上或向下按鈕控制項的集合。A control displays a single string value that is selected from an collection by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 使用者也可以輸入文字在控制項中，除非屬性設定為`true`（在輸入字串必須符合可接受集合中的項目）。The user can also enter text in the control, unless the property is set to `true` (the string typed in must match an item in the collection to be accepted). 選取項目時，物件會轉換成字串值，以便顯示微調方塊中。When an item is selected, the object is converted to a string value so it can be displayed in the spin box. 若要建立的物件顯示集合控制項，您可以新增或移除的項目個別使用和方法。To create a collection of objects to display in the control, you can add or remove the items individually by using the and methods. 可以呼叫事件處理常式中，例如按鈕的事件。This can be called in an event handler, such as the event of a button. 可以依字母順序排序物件集合，藉由設定屬性`true`。The object collection can be sorted alphabetically by setting the property to `true`. 當屬性設定為`true`，如果您捲動過去的最後一個或第一次物件在集合中，清單將會從頭開始與第一個或最後一個物件分別並回復連續的清單中會出現。When the property is set to `true`, if you scroll past the last or first object in the collection, the list will start over with the first or last object respectively and appear to roll in a continuous list. 當或方法呼叫，在程式碼，或按一下向上或向下按鈕，呼叫來更新控制，以新的字串。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, is called to update the control with the new string. 如果設`true`，字串會對應到其中一個值，然後再更新控制項的文字顯示集合中。If is set to `true`, the string is matched to one of the values in the collection prior to updating the control's text display. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/includes/net-2015-md.md)]、將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整控制項的大小：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/includes/net-2015-md.md)], the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 為 控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
A new for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 若要取得或設定 屬性，您必須加入隨 .NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，您不應該呼叫基底類別的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DownButton() cil managed

summary.span: 顯示物件集合中的下一個項目。

span.span: Displays the next item in the object collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您移動執行中的項目集合控制項使用的向下按鈕，最終會在集合中的最後一個項目。As you move through the collection of items in the control using the down button, you will eventually reach the last item in the collection. 如果您要繼續，和設`true`，清單將會從頭開始與集合中第一個項目，並看起來似乎連續。If you continue, and is set to `true`, the list will start over with the first item in the collection and appear to be continuous. 當您使用最新的按鈕在集合內移動時，也會發生這種行為。This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the up button.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection

summary.span: 指派給微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的物件集合。

span.span: A collection of objects assigned to the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
A that contains an collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可以建置並提供給兩種方式的控制項。The collection can be built and made available to the control in two ways. 您也可以使用集合加入項目或方法。You can add items to the collection by using the or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The source of the event.
An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: The source of the event.
A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`、控制項選擇開頭為字元的清單中的項目。If the property is set to `true`, the control chooses the item on the list that begins with the character. 如果集合中的多個項目開始時具有相同的字元，控制項選取開頭為具類型的字元，從目前選取的位置開始的下一個項目。If more than one item in the collection starts with the same character, the control selects the next item that begins with the typed character, starting from the currently selected position. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使您將屬性，它會有值為。Even if you set the property, it will have a value of .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PaddingChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定已選取項目的索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the index value of the selected item.

value.span: 已選取項目之以零為起始的索引值。

span.span: The zero-based index value of the selected item.
The default value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會保留在微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 中目前選取的集合中項目的索引值。The property holds the index value of the item in the collection that is currently selected in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 集合項目可以重新指派新的索引值，如果屬性已變更從`false`至`true`。Collection items can be reassigned new index values if the property has been changed from `false` to `true`. 依字母順序重新排序集合的項目會被指派新的索引值。As the collection is re-sorted alphabetically, the items will be assigned a new index value. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用者輸入項目在微調方塊中，或如果尚未選取任何項目，值將會是預設值為-1。If the user has entered an item in the spin box, or if no item has been selected, the value will be the default value, -1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than the default, -1.
-or-

exception.span: 指派的值大於 次數。

span.span: The assigned value is greater than the count.

value.span: 根據 值而選取的項目。

span.span: The selected item based on the value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定這個屬性時，是其中一個項目在集合中，驗證的值和屬性設定為適當的索引值。When this property is set, the value is validated to be one of the items in the collection, and the property is set to the appropriate index value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedItemChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於當 屬性變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property has been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如事件發生，由使用者輸入新的值，或按一下控制項的向上或向下按鈕，可以在程式碼中變更屬性。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by the user typing in a new value or clicking the control's up or down buttons. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DomainUpDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DomainUpDown1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#381](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#381)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#381](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#381)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Sorted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否排序項目集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item collection is sorted.

value.span: 如果項目集合已排序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the item collection is sorted; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設`true`，依字母順序排序集合。When is set to `true`, the collection is sorted in alphabetical order. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回字串，代表 控制項。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the control.
A string that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回字串包含類型和值和屬性。The return string includes the type and the values for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpButton() cil managed

summary.span: 顯示集合中的前一個項目。

span.span: Displays the previous item in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您移動執行中的項目集合控制項使用的最新的按鈕，最終會在集合中的第一個項目。As you move through the collection of items in the control using the up button, you will eventually reach the first item in the collection. 如果您要繼續，和設`true`，清單將會從頭開始與集合中最後一個項目，並看起來似乎連續。If you continue, and is set to `true`, the list will start over with the last item in the collection and appear to be continuous. 當您瀏覽集合中的向下按鈕時，也會發生這種行為。This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the down button.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void UpdateEditText() cil managed

summary.span: 更新微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中的文字，以顯示選取的項目。

span.span: Updates the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) to display the selected item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Wrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出如果使用者持續超過清單的結尾，項目集合是否持續為第一個或最後一個項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection of items continues to the first or last item if the user continues past the end of the list.

value.span: 如果當使用者到達集合的開頭或結尾，而清單又重新開始時，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the list starts again when the user reaches the beginning or end of the collection; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，如果您連線到集合中的最後一個項目，並繼續，清單將會從頭開始與第一個項目，並看起來似乎連續。When the property is set to `true`, if you reach the last item in the collection and continue, the list will start over with the first item and appear to be continuous. 此行為的運作方式以及反向。This behavior works in reverse as well. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 此範例可讓您設定的某些屬性，並建立微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 中顯示的字串集合。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 程式碼會假設， ，和具現化表單上。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 此範例也會假設您具有宣告為 32 位元帶正負號整數，名為類別層級的成員變數`myCounter`。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 您可以在文字方塊中輸入字串，並將它加入至按一下按鈕時的集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 按一下核取方塊，您可以切換屬性，並觀察微調方塊中的項目集合中的差異。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box.
